headline: Simon Property price target lowered to $180 from $200 at BMO Capital
summary: BMO Capital analyst Juan Sanabria lowered the firm’s price target on Simon Property (SPG) to $180 from $200 and keeps a Market Perform rating on the shares. The firm made changes to its models for a number of REITs due to interest rate changes, recent results, and/or discussions with company management.
